review: First all the negative reviews - do some research you aren't buying a Roku for $35 read what it does and quit complaining about ALL the things YOU would like it to do- it works exactly as advertised.  I had no functionality wifi or any issues at all with it.Took me less that 5 minutes to set up and I was streaming Netflix.  My 3 year crappy Roku would not work anymore - so I bought this for streaming NetFlix -plus you tube as Roku took away any and all you tube apps years ago.
author: Quad Net

review: Very easy to use. Great reception from any room in the house. My husband loves using to show family videos.
author: Kirstin McCrank

review: I bought this to display local content from my computer/phone, but even when the video is playing in Chrome, it won't chromecast.  There is very little content for this dongle now.

review: It does what it said.  Very easy to set up, can work with any smart phones.  I installed it in my son 's room so that he could connect his iphone to his TV screen to avoid him in a small screening watching TV for too long.  it worth to buy and very strong signal even I can detected it with my Samsung in my bedroom to beam my phone screen to his TV.
